mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MU_MEMBER (MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_SEX, MEM_PHONE ,MEM_CELLPHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_ADDR, MEM_JOIN_STATUS) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_sex}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_cellphone}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_addr}, #{mem_join_status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MU_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{id} AND MEM_JOIN_STATUS = 0
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MU_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{id}
